data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Banskobystrický, Slovakia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Banskobystrický, Slovakia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Banskobystrický, Slovakia.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 9,681 believers in the state of Banskobystrický to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Banskobystrický, Slovakia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jew, Slovak-speaking people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jew, Slovak-speaking people know you.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Banskobystrický to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Banskobystrický with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 603,307 people in the state of Banskobystrický who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.
